abstractText: Various types of electronic equipment are used during spawning ground and carcass surveys. It is essential for surveyors to be familiar with the operation of this equipment and that adequate maintenance and care is followed to ensure proper functionality. The following instructions document the use of a PIT-tag detector and the proper way to scan an adult salmonid carcass for PIT-tags..
title: Spawning Ground Carcass PIT-tag Scanning v1.0
